author: ivan
msg: ra_neon: Save one more HTTP request.
(svn_ra_neon__get_file): Request checksum and resource type properties in
one request if caller requested file contents.

author: sf
msg: Some LDAP servers (wrongly) return LDAP_CONSTRAINT_VIOLATION if a user is
locked due to too many password retries. This should not cause an internal
server error but be treated as "auth denied".
